text.div:
Not Screened for Tobacco Use, Documentation of Medical Reason

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    G9904 Documentation of medical reason(s) for not screening for tobacco use (e.g., limited life expectancy, other medical reason)

name: Not Screened for Tobacco Use, Documentation of Medical Reason
